title: Ebro In The Morning - Rosenberg vs Kast One White-Ish Wednesday & A$AP Rocky's Response
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Subscribe to "Captains & Majors" on iTunes, Spotify, and Amazon. 

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/captains-majors-the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic/id1644231857 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/7ce3df43-baea-467a-9c40-065a397f4b4d/captains-majors---the-journey-to-the-hbcu-ny-football-classic 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/6ZuO0qvyWoeo3KxNutMxg6?si=50e84457edf147fa 

Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 9/27/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio talking about some of the biggest topics in hip hop and entertainment. They discuss A$AP Rocky's response to his Rolling Loud fail where he jumped into the mosh pit, Rihanna's possible guest for her upcoming Super Bowl performance, and it is also White Ish Wednesday! This week Rosenberg faced off against DJ Kast One Verzuz style on some of the biggest pop hits.

All that on top of your favorites such as Ride Or Die, Curved, and the Guru!

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
